Sentence 1: Jessica was dreading the weekend. Sentence 2: She would be spending a lot of time with a really annoying girl. Sentence 3: Jessica told herself that she could deal with it. Sentence 4: When the time came, Jessica got so annoyed she drank too much wine. Sentence 5: Now she was annoyed and had a headache.

Sentence 1: Bryce wanted to compete in the Baja races at the county fair. Sentence 2: He spent weeks fine tuning his car in preparation. Sentence 3: The day of the races he won his first race. Sentence 4: Then everything began to go wrong including two flat tires! Sentence 5: He ended the night in dead last with a broken car and a broken hand.

Sentence 1: Al was pulled over for exceeding the speed limit. Sentence 2: He was a school bus driver. Sentence 3: He pointed out the regulator to the cop. Sentence 1: The boys loved playing outside. Sentence 2: They had walkie talkies that the used to talk to each other. Sentence 3: They would run through the woods and keep in contact with them. Sentence 1: Andy was feeling very nervous. Sentence 2: He had a blind date at a restaurant. Sentence 3: He sat down and waited for the date to show up. Sentence 4: She said she would be wearing a black dress. Sentence 5: When she came through the door, Andy was impressed with her beauty.
